MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 6:52PM in the LL26 postcode area of Llanrwst following reports of safety concerns on the underground cable network. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers have arrived on site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:05PM on 5th March 2021.
